alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Madison; Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 22 at 9:53AM EDT until further notice by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... Aucilla River at Lamont (US 27) affecting Jefferson, Madison and Taylor Counties. For the Aucilla River...including Lamont (US 27)...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring is forecast to continue. * WHERE...Aucilla River at Lamont (US 27). * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 53.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM EDT Thursday the stage was 53.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:30 AM EDT Thursday was 53.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to 53.8 feet Monday morning. - Flood stage is 53.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 53.8 feet on 03/23/2014. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 400 AM EDT.
